reviews.review_title: A mouse in the restaurant, terrible treatment of children, slow service
reviews.positive_text: Location is nice, view is nice
reviews.negative_text:
Hello, to be honest, I don't know how to accurately describe my experience at this hotel. I could simply say that a mouse ran past us in the restaurant during breakfast, which says a lot about the sanitary conditions of the hotel. Maybe it was a character from the movie Ratatouille? But still, here's a list of what disappointed us:

1. I wouldn't recommend this hotel for families with children. It started with the fact that they didn't want to accommodate us with our little daughter (2 years old) in a regular room, even though we booked a regular room with her on booking.com. Then they said they would make an "exception" for us. We didn't argue about the exception because we were tired.

2. We decided to relax in the pool, but it seems that children in this hotel are not allowed to do much. In the pool, you can't swim in the outdoor jacuzzi, in the indoor jacuzzi, or even in the second part of the pool. You can't use the steam room and sauna. There are two people specifically tasked with literally kicking dozens of children out of the pool where they are not allowed. They only allow swimming in one part.

3. Dinner took forever. We dined at the Bistro. It took 1 hour and 20 minutes between the appetizer and the main course. After we asked for more wine, we waited 15 minutes for it to be brought to us.

reviews.positive_text: Great location overlooking the sea and the staff were extremely helpful.  The room was very well done and the bed was extremely comfortable.
reviews.negative_text: The rooms were rather small and the wardrobe was tiny.

reviews.review_title: A comfortable and relaxing interlude in our vacation
reviews.positive_text: We had a lovely room and there was a wonderful party on the beach for hotel guests the night we stayed.  Great food and entertainment.  The concierge desk was extremely helpful.

reviews.review_title: Amazing hotel and staff! However watch out for the large hidden charge!
reviews.positive_text: The hotel was fabulous and in a fantastic location. The staff were all very friendly, helpful and accommodating. The spa are is also a must, extremely good! My wife and I had an amazing stay
reviews.negative_text: Unfortunately there was no transparency from Booking.com when we booked our holiday through the app. We were told that the only charge to expect from the hotel would be a ‚Äòcity tax‚Äô of just over ‚Ç¨26. However when we arrived the hotel insisted on a ‚Ç¨2,000 deposit for our stay. This led to a very awkward and tense start to our stay and the money unfortunately wasn‚Äôt returned for another 10 days after our checkout!
